item.title: Prokaryotic Transcription
item.description: UTR Stands for untranslated region. Not all of the mRNA contains info to code for protein.

item.title: Tay-Sachs Syndrome
item.description: Tay-Sachs Disease is caused to due Hexosaminidase A. GM2 Ganglioside is accumulated in this disease. It is caused due to an error in the removal of introns.

item.title: Transcription and RNA Processing
item.description: RNA Polymerase The DNA Polymerase identifies the RNA Primer as its cue to start replicating the strand of DNA. In the case of RNA Polymerase, it identifies the promoter present before the gene.
